rewrite1:
Please follow these steps for formatting the document:

- In the sixth paragraph, set the outline level to Level 5 and adjust the line spacing to 1.5 lines.

- For the portion of the text you've selected, apply a highlight using the color with the hex code #FF00FF and add a double underline for emphasis.

- Moving on to the fifth paragraph, alter the spacing to include one line before the paragraph begins and remove any space after it. Increase the text size to 48 points to make it stand out, and ensure that any previous highlighting is removed to clear the formatting.

rewrite3:
Please apply the following formatting changes to your Word document:

- In the sixth paragraph, set the Outline level to 5 and adjust the line spacing to 1.5 lines.

- For the text you have selected, use the highlight color with the hex code #FF00FF and add a double underline for emphasis.

- Moving to the fifth paragraph, modify the spacing to include a one-line space before the paragraph and remove any space after it. Increase the font size significantly to 48 points, and make sure to remove any previous highlighting from this paragraph.
